name: part_006
file: tmp_真夏のReGLOSSカラオケ！〜新曲披露もあるよ〜【#真夏のReGLOSS】 [DiHB5voNt00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: The ReGLOSS members discuss the next turn for the karaoke session while sitting on the sofa.
Juufuutei Raden performs a high-energy cover of 'Kokoro Odoru' by nobodyknows+.
The members praise Raden's performance and discuss her stamina as they return to their seats.

subtitles.original: でも、ってことは次はらでんちゃんの番？
subtitles.english: But, does that mean it's Raden-chan's turn next?

subtitles.original: 番じゃん
subtitles.english: It's your turn.

subtitles.original: なん、え、え、番っしょ
subtitles.english: Wh- Wait, it's definitely your turn.

subtitles.original: 君だ！
subtitles.english: It's you!

subtitles.original: 番？
subtitles.english: My turn?

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、ここでまた盛り上がる系の曲を...
subtitles.english: Then, I think I'll go with another high-energy song...

subtitles.original: いこうかなと思います！
subtitles.english: ...here!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Ohh!

subtitles.original: 楽しみ！
subtitles.english: Can't wait!

subtitles.original: さあ、チャトラの皆さん、ENJOYの準備をお願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Now, everyone in Chatora, please get ready to ENJOY!

subtitles.original: ENJOYね
subtitles.english: ENJOY, right.

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、いきましょう、準備OKです！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's go, I'm ready!

subtitles.original: みんな一緒に盛り上がってください！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please have a great time together!
